name: Immune Defender
description:
In Immune Defender you take the reins as the last line of defense between a healthy immune system and complete infestation of infectious bacteria!

Use resources gathered from defeated bacteria to build powerful support cells that help you take care of your host by protecting them from relentless waves of infection.

This is my first Game Jam entry, and should be treated more like a demo than a completed game. If you enjoy the idea, or have any thoughts on how to make it better, email me at 510productions@gmail.com.

There were lots of ideas that were intended to be put in the game that were not able to be included because of time constraints, but development will continue after the jam until a more polished product has been made that will stay here on itch.io for free.
